therian.operator.copy.Copier

    therian.operator.copy  

    • Uses of Copier in therian.operator.copy

      Subclasses of Copier in therian.operator.copy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeanCopier
      Copies Object to Object.
      class  BeanToMapCopier
      Copy a bean's properties into a Map.
      class  ContainerCopier<TARGET>
      Tries to convert source and target to Iterables, copy source elements onto corresponding target elements, then to add remaining elements to target.
      static class  ContainerCopier.Dynamic<TARGET> 
      static class  ContainerCopier.ToArray 
      static class  ContainerCopier.ToEnumeration 
      static class  ContainerCopier.ToIterable 
      static class  ContainerCopier.ToIterator 
      class  ConvertingCopier
      Copy Operator that attempts overwriting conversion for writable target positions storing immutable values.
      class  MapCopier
      Copies between maps, handling supported conversions between keys/values.
      class  MapToBeanCopier
      Copy a Map's properties onto a bean.
      class  PropertyCopier<SOURCE,TARGET>
      Copies based on annotations.
